```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(tidytuesdayR)
library(tidymodels)
library(tidyverse)
library(rvest)
```

```{r}
tuesdata <- tidytuesdayR::tt_load(2021, week = 39)
nominees <- tuesdata$nominees
```

```{r}
nominees %>%
  select(-c(logo, page, page_id))
```
